filters.isPinned: Is it pinned on the portal?
filters.notIncludeSensitiveWords: It does not contain sensitive words

login.title: Log in
login.subtitle: Thank you for fighting with us against the disinformation accompanying the coronavirus epidemic! #fakehunter.
login.cta: Want to join the community fighting disinformation? Report back!

register.title: Registration
register.subtitle: Thank you for your application! Register and join the community of the #FakeHunter.
register.success: Registration was successful! <2>Go to login page</2>.
register.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Log in!
register.agreement: I consent to the processing of my personal data (i.e. name and surname and e-mail address) for the purpose of setting up and maintaining an account on this website. I know that giving consent is voluntary, but necessary in order to register. I can withdraw my consent at any time.

passwordReset.title: Reset password
passwordReset.subtitle: Set a new password. Password should contain at least 8 characters, one capital letter, one number and a special character.
passwordReset.success: Your password has been changed. Go to login page.

passwordResetRequest.title: Reset password
passwordResetRequest.subtitle: Enter the e-mail used to create the account. We will send an instruction on how to reset the password.
passwordResetRequest.success: We have sent further instructions on how to reset your password to the e-mail address provided.

users.specialistInfo: First add subject categories in settings.

community.title: Community
community.promote: Assign the role of an expert

tags.label: Tags
tags.errorSubmission: Submissions can have a maximum of 6 tags.

sensitiveWords.title: Sensitive words
sensitiveWords.info: This module allows you to add sensitive words. If sensitive words appear in the submitted text, the verdict will be published on the portal only after the expert's verdict.

notifications.title: Subscription to email notifications
notifications.info: This section allows you to manage email notifications. You can opt-in or opt-out of receiving notifications about new requests.

domains.title: Categories
domains.info: This module allows you to add news categories. These categories are used to break down entries by subject area and assign them to specialists (subject experts).

tags.title: Tags
tags.info: This module allows you to edit tags (hashtags). Tags allow grouping related entries with each other thematically.

password.title: Password change
password.info: The new password should contain: at least 8 characters, at least one capital letter, at least one digit, at least one special character
password.successMsg: Your password has been successfully changed!

details.title: Notification
details.assignedToMe: This submission is assigned to you
details.assignedToOther: This report has been assigned to another expert.

adminDetails.pinSubmission: Pin the submission on the portal
adminDetails.noScreenshot: This report does not contain a screenshot.

verification.title: Verification form
verification.submissionTitleHelp: Enter a title in the form of a question, for example, "Can pets carry the coronavirus?"
verification.sourcesHelp: Please include the sources on which you base your verdict
verification.author: Author

validations.min: This field requires at least {{min}} characters
validations.max: This field may contain up to {{max}} characters
validations.email: Please enter a valid e-mail address
validations.passwordMin: The password cannot be shorter than 8 characters.
validations.passwordBigLetter: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
validations.passwordNumber: Password must have at least one digit.
validations.passwordSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character.
validations.registerAgreement: Expressing consent to the processing of personal data is necessary to set up an account
validations.requiredDuplicateUrl: Provide a link to the duplicate request
validations.requiredSources: Please provide the sources used fo verdict
validations.minVerdictComment: The justification cannot be shorter than 500 characters
